name: trip
tagline: A trip planning and travel logging application
description: Trip is a self-hosted trip planning and travel log application. It helps organize itineraries, notes, and expenses for journeys, offering a convenient web UI for planning and documentation.

features.title: Itinerary Planning
features.description: Plan trip itineraries with activities, accommodations, and transportation details

features.title: Travel Notes
features.description: Document travel experiences with notes, photos, and memories for each trip

features.title: Expense Tracking
features.description: Track trip expenses by category to understand costs and stay within budget

features.title: Destination Management
features.description: Organize trips by destination with maps and location information

features.title: Activity Scheduling
features.description: Schedule activities and events with dates and times for organized travel

features.title: Packing Lists
features.description: Create and manage packing lists to ensure you don't forget essential items

features.title: Document Storage
features.description: Store travel documents like tickets, reservations, and confirmations in one place

features.title: Trip Sharing
features.description: Share trip plans with travel companions for collaborative planning
